examples.sentence: Temporal: 学校の前に勉強する "study before school"
Spatial: 学校の前に車がある "there's a car in front of the school"

sections.heading: Overview
sections.content:
Japanese uses 前 (まえ - mae) for "before" and 後 (あと - ato) for "after" to express temporal relationships between events or actions.

食べる前 "before eating" 食べた後 "after eating"

children.heading: Formation with Verbs
children.content:
Use the dictionary form (present tense) before 前:

Verb (dictionary form) + 前 食べる前 - before eating 行く前 - before going 寝る前 - before sleeping

children.heading: Formation with Nouns
children.content: Noun + の + 前 食事の前 - before the meal 会議の前 - before the meeting 学校の前 - before school

children.heading: Common Patterns with 前
children.content: 寝る前に歯を磨く "I brush my teeth before sleeping" 出かける前に電話した "I called before going out" テストの前に勉強する "I study before the test" 食事の前に手を洗う "I wash my hands before meals"

children.heading: Formation with Verbs
children.content:
Use the た form (past tense) before 後:

Verb (た form) + 後 食べた後 - after eating 行った後 - after going 見た後 - after seeing

children.heading: Formation with Nouns
children.content: Noun + の + 後 食事の後 - after the meal 会議の後 - after the meeting 学校の後 - after school

children.heading: Common Patterns with 後
children.content: 食べた後、歯を磨く "After eating, I brush my teeth" 帰った後、電話してください "Please call after you get home" 映画を見た後、レストランに行った "After watching the movie, we went to a restaurant" 会議の後で話しましょう "Let's talk after the meeting"

children.heading: Verb Forms
children.content:
前: Dictionary form (present) 食べる前 - before eating 後: た form (past) 食べた後 - after eating

This is consistent - even for future actions:

明日行く前に電話する "I'll call before going tomorrow" 明日行った後で会おう "Let's meet after going tomorrow"

children.heading: に (more common)
children.content: 寝る前に "before sleeping" 食べた後に "after eating"

children.heading: で (also acceptable)
children.content:
寝る前で "before sleeping" 食べた後で "after eating"

Note: Both are correct, but に is more common. で can emphasize the timing more.

children.heading: [Time] + 前
children.content: 3時間前 - 3 hours ago 2日前 - 2 days ago 1週間前 - 1 week ago 1年前 - 1 year ago 1時間前に電話した "I called 1 hour ago" 2日前に会った "I met (them) 2 days ago"

children.heading: [Time] + 後
children.content: 3時間後 - 3 hours later 2日後 - 2 days later 1週間後 - 1 week later 1年後 - 1 year later 1時間後に来る "I'll come 1 hour later" 2日後に会いましょう "Let's meet 2 days later"

children.heading: 〜の前 (in front of)
children.content:
駅の前 - in front of the station 家の前 - in front of the house 学校の前 - in front of the school 駅の前で待っている "I'm waiting in front of the station"

Context determines meaning:

Temporal: 学校の前に勉強する "study before school" Spatial: 学校の前に車がある "there's a car in front of the school"

children.heading: Example 1: Daily Routine
children.content: A: いつ歯を磨きますか？ "When do you brush your teeth?" B: 寝る前と、起きた後に磨きます "I brush before sleeping and after waking up" A: 朝ごはんの前？後？ "Before or after breakfast?" B: 朝ごはんの後です "After breakfast"

children.heading: Example 2: Meeting Plans
children.content: A: いつ会いましょうか？ "When shall we meet?" B: 会議の後はどうですか？ "How about after the meeting?" A: 何時に終わりますか？ "What time does it end?" B: 3時に終わります。3時半に会いましょう "It ends at 3. Let's meet at 3:30"

children.heading: Example 3: Past Events
children.content: A: いつ日本に来ましたか？ "When did you come to Japan?" B: 1年前に来ました "I came 1 year ago" A: 来る前に日本語を勉強しましたか？ "Did you study Japanese before coming?" B: はい、2年間勉強しました "Yes, I studied for 2 years"

children.heading: Mistake 1: Wrong verb form
children.content: Wrong: 食べた前 ❌ Right: 食べる前 ✓ "before eating" Wrong: 食べる後 ❌ Right: 食べた後 ✓ "after eating"

children.heading: Mistake 2: Using wrong form for future
children.content: Wrong: 明日行った前 ❌ Right: 明日行く前 ✓ "before going tomorrow" Note: Use dictionary form for 前 even for future

children.heading: Mistake 3: Confusing spatial and temporal
children.content: 学校の前に勉強する "study before school" (temporal) 学校の前に車がある "there's a car in front of school" (spatial) Context makes the meaning clear!

children.heading: 〜する前に (before doing)
children.content: 出かける前に "before going out" 寝る前に "before sleeping" 食べる前に "before eating"

children.heading: 〜した後で (after doing)
children.content: 帰った後で "after returning" 見た後で "after seeing" 聞いた後で "after hearing"

children.heading: 〜の前に (before [noun])
children.content: 試験の前に "before the exam" パーティーの前に "before the party" 出発の前に "before departure"

children.heading: 〜の後で (after [noun])
children.content: 授業の後で "after class" 仕事の後で "after work" 食事の後で "after the meal"

children.heading: Sequential Actions
children.content: Before then after: 勉強する前に準備して、勉強した後で休む "I prepare before studying, and rest after studying"

children.heading: Time Sequence
children.content: 1週間前に予約して、1週間後に行く "I'll make a reservation 1 week before and go 1 week later"

children.heading: 前 (ago)
children.content:
Looking back from now:

2日前 - 2 days ago (from now) 1時間前 - 1 hour ago 昨日の3時間前 - 3 hours before yesterday

children.heading: 後 (later)
children.content:
Looking forward from a point:

2日後 - 2 days later (from a reference point) 1時間後 - 1 hour later 明日の3時間後 - 3 hours after tomorrow

children.heading: Casual
children.content: 食べる前 "before eating" 食べた後 "after eating"

children.heading: Polite
children.content: 食べる前に "before eating" 食べた後で "after eating"

children.heading: Before (前)
children.content: 寝る前に歯を磨く "I brush my teeth before sleeping" 出かける前に電話する "I'll call before going out" 食事の前に手を洗う "I wash my hands before meals" テストの前に勉強した "I studied before the test"

children.heading: After (後)
children.content: 食べた後、歯を磨く "I brush my teeth after eating" 映画を見た後、レストランに行った "After watching the movie, we went to a restaurant" 帰った後で電話してください "Please call after you get home" 授業の後で会いましょう "Let's meet after class"

children.heading: Time Ago (前)
children.content: 3時間前に電話した "I called 3 hours ago" 1週間前に日本に来た "I came to Japan 1 week ago" 2日前に会った "I met (them) 2 days ago"

children.heading: Time Later (後)
children.content: 2時間後に来る "I'll come 2 hours later" 3日後に出発する "I'll depart 3 days later" 1年後に結婚した "I got married 1 year later"

children.heading: Sequential Actions
children.content: 朝起きた後、シャワーを浴びる前に運動する "After waking up in the morning, I exercise before taking a shower" 勉強する前に準備して、勉強した後で休む "I prepare before studying and rest after studying"

sections.heading: Related Grammar Points
sections.content: 〜てから (te-kara) - After doing Time Words - Time expressions Duration - Time periods Sequential Actions - Ordering events While/During - Simultaneous actions Te-form - Connecting actions
